text_block_list.text:
Like many of Tracen Academy's horsegirls, Matikanefukukitaru 
had chosen to make use of summer camp to improve her skills, 
so here we were, at the beachside facilities.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Fwooohoo～ I've really worked up a sweat and we haven't even started training yet!

Though we were here for training, Matikanefukukitaru had 
shown up carrying a large amount of baggage.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
My collection of lucky items, it is! I left something like a hundred 
of them behind in the dorm and brought the rest here with me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You see, I actually thought this summer would be a good 
opportunity to part ways with them once and for all. 
Now the only question is how I should do so.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: In the what!? You would simply throw these wondrous miracle items into the trash!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
…… Granted, I can't just bury them on the beach here. 
It was good and well to bring them on impulse, but I 
haven't quite thought about how to dispose of them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I owe a lot to these little trinkets, so I was hoping to give 
them a proper burial. It lacks me only a good method…

Given how lovingly she relied on her lucky items at all times, 
seeing her willingly looking to part with them was a clear 
indication of just how much she had changed.

I'm not sure exactly how she arrived at this decision, 
but her determination is to be acknowledged.
choice_data_list: I'll help you think of something.
I'll help you think of something.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: You will!? Oh, I am most grateful for your help!

For a while, I enjoyed the chirps and hums of insects 
drifting on the summer air. Until ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are, Trainer!

A familiar shrill voice pierced through this peaceful 
moment to herald the arrival of Matikanefukukitaru.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Why have you chosen this place? 
I don't see anything of particular note…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, there's a small creek here, who would have thought! Heeh, now that's charming～

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'm getting the urge to make one of those bamboo leaf boats 
to send downstream. Great luck if it stays afloat, and else 
don't mind, I guess!
choice_data_list: I thought we could send down your items.
I thought we could send down your items.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Heh? My items…? Ah! You mean… I can send them off down the water here? I… I get it now～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, sending items and persons off down a river in mourning 
or remembrance is a most traditional Japanese custom.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Be it the offerings of Obon, the lanterns and hina dolls of their respective floating rituals, the noodles of nagashi soumen… An odd one crept in, perhaps, but the practice is common.
choice_data_list: How do you feel about my suggestion?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Right! I must say, I like it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Reminiscing about each one while watching it drift away… 
Hopefully, it will help me conclude a chapter of my growth, 
leaving behind the times when I relied on them so much.

With that settled, we began sending her 
lucky items down the flowing stream.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Farewell, my dear little kids' meal flag… Back in elementary, offering a small prayer to this gave me a good score on a test.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If I did my best, mom would take me out 
for another kids' meal. Thinking about that 
helped me focus more on studying!

The little flag was thus set adrift on the water. 
For my part, I couldn't help but think to myself… 
"Wasn't that just your stomach speaking…?".

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Please hand me that damaged playing card deck next. 
It's quite exceptional, I tell you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I always won when I played with this deck, and that's because 
only I recognized the cards' blemishes. So long, my dears!

The deck of cards was thus set adrift on the water. 
For my part, I couldn't help but think to myself… 
"Aren't those just straight-up marked cards…?".
This pattern continued for a while ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
We've reached the last one! It's also one of my most 
precious ones. Granny gave me this carved wooden doll…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It was back when I was a timid little girl. 
Ever since, it has watched over me, the same way she did.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
…… But I've grown a lot. I won't need it anymore now. 
You do the honors for me, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Granny… I'll be fine on my own now! …… Fareweeeell!
…… Somewhere in heaven, I'm sure her grandma is smiling.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'll bring you back a souvenir when this camp is oveeeer!
…… Or somewhere in Japan still.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Phew, we're all done now.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I've grown just a small amount. 
Not to mention my room will look a lot cleaner.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I will make sure not to cause anyone trouble anymore with… Heh? Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Have I not just caused trouble already?! Those items will be 
carried all the way to the ocean, will they not?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Have I been polluting our beautiful natural environment!? Awawawah, what do I do now!?

Seeing how panicked she was, I guided her 
downstream along the river.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Mhoh? Do my eyes pick up a net spanning the creek?! All my items are caught in it…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Truly, you have thought of everything, Trainer! 
I knew you were incredible! A real savior!
choice_data_list: Let's give these a proper homa burial.
Let's give these a proper homa burial.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Yes! We can do it on the beach like one of those big bonfires!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hwooaah… it really is a pretty sight.

With all her lucky items collected, the resulting ritual fire 
bathed the whole area in a warm light.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I may have many lucky items left at the dorm, but it still 
comes as a surprise to myself that I could find the resolve 
to go through with this.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Though divination and my lucky items are both things 
I never want to find myself without, I believe my own 
efforts and struggles are just as important.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I might even invite Divine Shiraoki's admonishment 
upon me if I rely on her kindness all the time.
choice_data_list: That's real admirable if you ask me.
That's a good attitude to have.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… it's a little embarrassing to hear such praise.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Aside from that, I have you by my side, Trainer. 
The power you wield to change my future is many 
times more potent than any lucky item.
choice_data_list: I'll do my best to bring you fortune.
I'll do my best to bring you fortune.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ohhoo～ Hearing you say so is emboldening. I'm certain great blessings await just around the corner!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I will do my very best as well, so that I can be ready 
to welcome any good fortune that comes my way!

Matikanefukukitaru's enthusiasm seemed 
to burn as bright as the bonfire.
